languages.text:
A forceful tail lash that deals <u>(from 13 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to all creatures adjacent to Malice. Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} have to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If they fail, they are {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} away and knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}Crippled{/g} targets cannot fall prone when hit by this ability.
languages.original_text:
Мощный удар хвостом наносит <u>(от 13 до 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающего урона{/g} всем существам на соседних клетках со Злобой. Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}, и в случае провала эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} их и {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывает{/g}.
Враги с {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}увечьем{/g} не могут быть опрокинуты этой способностью.

traits.locale_text:
A forceful tail lash that deals 17-23 {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to all creatures adjacent to Malice. Targets hit by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} have to pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If they fail, they are pushed away and knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}Crippled{/g} targets can't fall prone when hit by this ability.

A forceful tail lash that deals <u>(from 13 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to all creatures adjacent to Malice. languages.text:
Мощный удар хвостом наносит <u>(от 13 до 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающего урона{/g} всем существам на соседних клетках со Злобой. Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}, и в случае провала эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} их и {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывает{/g}.
Враги с {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}увечьем{/g} не могут быть опрокинуты этой способностью.

力強い尻尾のむち打ち{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}一撃{/g}で、マリスに隣接する全ての生物に<u>13～18</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}を与える。この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g} が命中したターゲットは、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。失敗すれば{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}押しのけられ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}になる。
このアビリティで命中しても、{g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}障害{/g}あるターゲットはうつ伏せにならない。
languages.original_text:
A forceful tail lash that deals <u>(from 13 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to all creatures adjacent to Malice. Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} have to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If they fail, they are {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} away and knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}Crippled{/g} targets cannot fall prone when hit by this ability.

traits.locale_text:
力強い尻尾のむち打ち一撃で、マリスに隣接する全ての生物に17～23の{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}を与える。この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を受けたターゲットは、耐久力{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に合格しなければならない。失敗すれば突き飛ばされ、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。
このアビリティを受けても、{g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}障害ある{/g}ターゲットは脆弱化しない。

languages.text:
强力尾鞭打击，对恶棍周围所有生物造成<u>13-18</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}。被此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。如果目标未能通过检定，则会被{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}，并陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。
处于{g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}致残{/g}效果的目标不会陷入倒地状态。

If they fail, they are {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} away and knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

强力尾鞭打击，对恶棍周围所有生物造成<u>13-18</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}。被此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。如果目标未能通过检定，则会被{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}，并陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。
处于{g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}致残{/g}效果的目标不会陷入倒地状态。

languages.text:
Un coletazo poderoso que inflige <u>(de 13 a 18)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g} a todas las criaturas adyacentes a Malicia. Los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} por esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} tienen que superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. Si fallan, quedan {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empujados{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados.{/g}
Los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}lisiados{/g} no quedan derribados al recibir el impacto de esta capacidad.
languages.original_text:
A forceful tail lash that deals <u>(from 13 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to all creatures adjacent to Malice. Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} have to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If they fail, they are {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} away and knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}Crippled{/g} targets cannot fall prone when hit by this ability.

traits.locale_text:
Un coletazo poderoso que inflige 17-23 de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g} a todas las criaturas adyacentes a Malicia. Los objetivos alcanzados por esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} tienen que superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Resistencia. Si fallan, quedan empujados y {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.
Los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}lisiados{/g} no quedan derribados al recibir el impacto de esta capacidad.

languages.text:
Ein kraftvoller Hieb mit dem Schwanz, der bei allen an Tücke angrenzenden Kreaturen <u>(13 bis 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechenden Schaden{/g} verursacht. Von dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Ziele müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bestehen. Misslingt die Probe, werden sie {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}weggestoßen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}Verkrüppelte{/g} Ziele können nicht hingestreckt werden, wenn sie von der Fähigkeit getroffen werden.

A forceful tail lash that deals <u>(from 13 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to all creatures adjacent to Malice. Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} have to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If they fail, they are {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} away and knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Ein kraftvoller Hieb mit dem Schwanz, der bei allen an Bosheit angrenzenden Kreaturen 17-23 {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechenden Schaden{/g} verursacht. Von dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} getroffene Ziele müssen eine Zähigkeits-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen. Bei Nichtbestehen werden sie weggestoßen und {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}Verkrüppelte{/g} Ziele können nicht hingestreckt werden, wenn sie von der Fähigkeit getroffen werden.

languages.text:
Puissant coup de queue qui inflige <u>(de 13 à 18)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts de lacération{/g} à toutes les créatures adjacentes à Malice. Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. Si elles échouent à ce test, elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repoussées{/g} et subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.
Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}estropiées{/g} sont invulnérables à l'effet Paralysie lorsqu'elles sont touchées par cette capacité.
languages.original_text:
A forceful tail lash that deals <u>(from 13 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} to all creatures adjacent to Malice. Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} have to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. traits.locale_text:
Puissant coup de queue qui inflige 17 à 23 points de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts perforants{/g} à toutes les créatures adjacentes à Démon. Les cibles touchées par cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test{/g} lié à la Résistance. Si elles échouent à ce test, elles sont repoussées et subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.
Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}estropiées{/g} sont invulnérables à l'effet Paralysie lorsqu'elles sont touchées par cette capacité.

languages.text:
Melanet'in bitişiğindeki tüm yaratıklara <u>(13 ila 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}yırtma hasarı{/g} veren güçlü bir kuyruk darbesi. Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} hedefler, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır. Başarısız olurlarsa uzağa doğru {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}itilip{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilirler{/g}.
Bu kabiliyetin vurduğu {g|Encyclopedia:CrippledEffect}kötürüm{/g} hedefler, yere devrilemezler.
